trans-unit.source: Represents the Behavior objects that are managed by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A viselkedés objektumok által kezelt jelöli egy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class can be extended to develop any type of user interface behavior, including selection, drag, and resize behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály annak a felhasználói felület viselkedését, beleértve a kiválasztott, húzza, bármilyen típusú fejlesztése és viselkedéseinek méretezése.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Behavior Service Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd: [viselkedés szolgáltatás áttekintése](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Your Behavior type must be associated with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> type.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A viselkedéstípus társítani kell egy <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>típusa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: Glyph-independent behaviors are not supported.
trans-unit.target: A betűkép-független viselkedés nem támogatottak.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> class with the given <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> az osztály az adott <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The parent behavior is the next behavior on the behavior stack maintained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: Szülő a rendszer nem tartja fenn a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> viselkedés veremben a következő viselkedés

trans-unit.source: If the `callParentBehavior` parameter is `true`, then the `behaviorService` parameter must not be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha a `callParentBehavior` paraméter `true`, akkor a `behaviorService` paraméter nem lehet `null`.

trans-unit.source: `callParentBehavior` indicates whether the base <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> class should call the parent behavior, and then allow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> select the correct parent behavior.
trans-unit.target: `callParentBehavior`azt jelzi, hogy a következő <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>osztály kell hívható meg a szülő viselkedését, és ezután lehetővé teszi a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>Válassza ki a megfelelő szülő viselkedését.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent behavior should be called if it exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a szülő viselkedését kell meghívni, ha létezik; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to use.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref> to use.

trans-unit.source: callParentBehavior is , and behaviorService is .
trans-unit.target: callParentBehavioris , and behaviorService is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the cursor that should be displayed for this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Ez a viselkedés lekéri a kurzor alakja, üzenetnek kell megjelennie.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"></xref> that represents the cursor that should be displayed for this behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Cursor"> </xref> , amely a kurzor alakja, ez a viselkedés megjelenjenek jelöli.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> objects should be disabled.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi, hogy egy érték, amely jelzi, hogy <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> objektumok le kell tiltani.

trans-unit.source: A `true` value for the DisableAllCommands property indicates to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> that all <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> objects the designer receives should have their state disabled when this behavior is active.
trans-unit.target: A `true` érték, a DisableAllCommands tulajdonság azt jelzi, hogy a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>, amely minden <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>megkapja a Tervező objektumok le van tiltva, ha ez a viselkedés aktív állapotukra kell rendelkeznie.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: The DisableAllCommands property works in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> method so you can customize the interaction between glyphs and behaviors.
trans-unit.target: A DisableAllCommands tulajdonság működik együtt a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>módszer így testre szabhatja a glyphs elem és viselkedéshez közötti interakció.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the results of a call to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> for a particular <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.
trans-unit.target: A következő táblázat összefoglalja <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A>az egy adott <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.FindCommand%2A> hívásakor eredményei

trans-unit.source: |||| |-|-|-| ||DisableAllCommands is `true`|DisableAllCommands is `false`| |Hit-tested glyph has an assigned behavior|If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> with the specified `command ID` is found in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>, that <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is disabled and returned.
trans-unit.target: |||| |-|-|-| || DisableAllCommands van `true`|} DisableAllCommands van `false`|} | Találati tesztelésen átesett betűkép van egy hozzárendelt viselkedés |} Ha a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>és a megadott `command ID` megtalálható a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService>, adott <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>le van tiltva, adott vissza.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, `null` is returned.|<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A> is called on the behavior and, if found, the behavior’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Ellenkező esetben `null` adja vissza. |} <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>elnevezése a működését és található, a viselkedés <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>adja vissza.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with the specified `command ID` is returned.| |Hit-tested glyph has no assigned behavior|The result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with the specified `command ID` is returned.|The result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with the specified `command ID` is returned.|
trans-unit.target: Ellenkező esetben a megadott <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eredménye `command ID` adja vissza. |} | Találati tesztelésen átesett betűkép rendelkezik nincs hozzárendelt viselkedés |} A megadott <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eredménye `command ID` adja vissza. |} Eredményét <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>és a megadott `command ID` adja vissza. |}</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IMenuCommandService.FindCommand%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref> objects the designer receives should have states set to `Enabled = false` when this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> is active; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az összes <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"> </xref> megkapja a Tervező objektumok kell rendelkeznie beállított `Enabled = false` amikor ez <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"> </xref> aktív; egyéb, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Intercepts commands.
trans-unit.target: Elfog parancsok.

trans-unit.source: The FindCommand method is called from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: A FindCommand metódus lehívásra kerül a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>

trans-unit.source: It provides an opportunity for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> to return its own custom <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>, thereby intercepting this message.
trans-unit.target: Lehetőséget nyújt a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>vissza a saját egyéni <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand>, ami észleli ezt az üzenetet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.CommandID"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.MenuCommand"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: By default, FindCommand returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Alapértelmezés szerint FindCommand adja vissza <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: Lehetővé teszi egyéni fogd és vidd viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> object on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> objektumra vonatkozó meghívni a fogd és vidd viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-enter behavior.
trans-unit.target: Egyéni engedélyek húzza-adja meg a viselkedést.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-enter behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> használandó meghívása húzza-adja meg a viselkedést.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-leave behavior.
trans-unit.target: Lehetővé teszi egyéni húzza-hagyja viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-leave behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> amelyen húzza-hagyja viselkedés meghívni.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-over behavior.
trans-unit.target: Lehetővé teszi egyéni során fogd viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-over behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> használandó meghívása során fogd viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: Permits custom drag-and-drop feedback behavior.
trans-unit.target: Lehetővé teszi egyéni fogd és vidd visszajelzés viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> amelyen meghívni a fogd és vidd viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GiveFeedbackEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.

trans-unit.source: Called by the adorner window when it loses mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: Ha elveszti a beolvasott egérállapot hívja a el a ablakban.

trans-unit.source: A behavior can request mouse capture through the behavior service by pushing itself onto the behavior stack with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság a beolvasott egérállapot a viselkedés szolgáltatáson keresztül kérheti a viselkedés verembe való küldésével magát a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService.PushCaptureBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: If it does so, it will be notified through the OnLoseCapture method when capture is lost.
trans-unit.target: Ha így tesz, akkor értesítést fog kapni a OnLoseCapture metódussal rögzítési elvész.

trans-unit.source: Generally the behavior removes itself from the stack at this time.
trans-unit.target: Általában a viselkedés eltávolítja magát a verem most.

trans-unit.source: Capture is lost when one of the following actions occurs: - Someone else requests capture.
trans-unit.target: Rögzítési elvész, esetén a következő műveletek egyikét:-valaki más rögzítési kéri.

trans-unit.source: - Another behavior is pushed.
trans-unit.target: -Fejlesztőre másik viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: - This behavior is removed.
trans-unit.target: – Ez a viselkedés a rendszer eltávolítja.

trans-unit.source: In each of these cases, OnLoseCapture will be called on the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Ezekben az esetekben egyes OnLoseCapture neve a működését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref> on which to invoke drag-and-drop behavior.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"> </xref> amelyen meghívni a fogd és vidd viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.EventArgs>, amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Called when any double-click message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hívható meg, ha bármely dupla üzenet kerül, az el a ablakban a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseDoubleClick method is called when any double-click message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: A OnMouseDoubleClick metódus lehívásra kerül, amikor duplán üzenetek eléri a `WndProc` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> el ablak

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Az üzenet először átadott itt, a childwindow- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>a viselkedés verem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Adatszolgáltató `true` a metódus jelzi, hogy az üzenet látta el a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>is nem dolgozható fel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Itt az üzenetet küldeni a megfelelő viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> value indicating which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> érték azt jelzi, mely gombra kattintott.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the click occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hely, kattintson a létrejöttének időpontját.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az üzenet látta; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-down message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meghívva, amikor az egér-le nyilas üzenetek kerül, az el a ablakban a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-down message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metódus lehívásra kerül, ha bármely egér-le nyilas üzenet kerül, a `WndProc` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> el ablak</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Az üzenet először átadott itt, a childwindow- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>a viselkedés verem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Adatszolgáltató `true` a metódus jelzi, hogy az üzenet látta el a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>is nem dolgozható fel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Itt az üzenetet küldeni a megfelelő viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> value indicating which button was clicked.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> érték azt jelzi, mely gombra kattintott.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the click occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hely, kattintson a létrejöttének időpontját.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az üzenet látta; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-enter message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hívható meg, ha bármely mouse-enter üzenet kerül, az el a ablakban a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-enter message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metódus lehívásra kerül, ha bármely mouse-enter üzenet kerül, a `WndProc` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> el ablak</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Itt az üzenetet küldeni a megfelelő viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: When the mouse pointer's location is positively hit-tested with a different <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> than previous hit tests, this method is called on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.
trans-unit.target: Abban az esetben, ha az egérmutató helye, pozitív találat-tesztelése egy másik <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>előző találati tesztek, mint ez a metódus hívása van <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> társított</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az üzenet látta; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-hover message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meghívva, amikor az egér-rámutatáskor üzenetek kerül, az el a ablakban a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-hover message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metódus lehívásra kerül, ha bármely egér-rámutatáskor üzenet kerül, a `WndProc` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> el ablak</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message is first passed here, to the top-most <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> in the behavior stack.
trans-unit.target: Az üzenet először átadott itt, a childwindow- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>a viselkedés verem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: Returning `true` from this method signifies that the message was handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> and should not continue to be processed.
trans-unit.target: Adatszolgáltató `true` a metódus jelzi, hogy az üzenet látta el a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>is nem dolgozható fel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Itt az üzenetet küldeni a megfelelő viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The location at which the hover occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hely, ahol az egérmutatót történt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was handled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az üzenet látta; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when any mouse-leave message enters the adorner window of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Meghívva, amikor az egér-hagyja üzenetek kerül, az el a ablakban a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A> method is called when any mouse-leave message enters the `WndProc` of the adorner window of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>metódus lehívásra kerül, ha bármely egér-kilépési üzenet kerül, a `WndProc` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.BehaviorService> el ablak</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior.OnMouseDoubleClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: From here, the message is sent to the appropriate behavior.
trans-unit.target: Itt az üzenetet küldeni a megfelelő viselkedését.

trans-unit.source: When the mouse pointer leaves a positively hit-tested <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>, this method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Amikor az egérmutató kilép egy pozitív találat tesztelésen átesett <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>érvényes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior>, ez a metódus meghívja.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sends this drag-and-drop event from the adorner window to the appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Behavior"></xref> or hit-tested <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.Behavior.Glyph"></xref>.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QueryContinueDragEventArgs"> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az eseményadatok.
